addr: World Room, Journalism. West 116th Street and Broadway. New York, New York 10025
title: Tree Lighting Winter Celebration
desc: Twinkling lights, hot cocoa on Low Steps and holiday songs with The Kingsmen! Join us back on campus for the popular Columbia tradition of the College Walk Tree Lighting and Winter Celebration. Celebrate with friends, family and students as College Walk's trees light up, then meet students and College alumni at the Journalism School's World Room (just off College Walk) for food, drinks, mingling and more musical performances. Thursday, December 3 Tree Lighting Ceremony College Walk | 6:00-7:00 p.m. Price: Free Winter Celebration The World Room, Journalism Building | 7:00-8:30 p.m. Price: $15 Children 3-12 are only $5! (Children under 3 are free.)
